org.crsh.command
Class GroovyScriptCommand

java.lang.Object
  groovy.lang.GroovyObjectSupport
      groovy.lang.Script
          org.crsh.command.GroovyScriptCommand
All Implemented Interfaces:
groovy.lang.GroovyObject, Closeable, Flushable, CommandInvoker<Object,Object>, ShellCommand, Consumer<Object>, Filter<Object,Object,InteractionContext<Object>>, Producer<Object,InteractionContext<Object>>
public abstract class GroovyScriptCommand
extends groovy.lang.Script
implements ShellCommand, CommandInvoker<Object,Object>
